attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop all aid to Sudan. As a result of the recent medieval and truly despicable treatment of Gill Gibbons in Sudan. Why should Britain help a country that "Spits in our eye" and blows a ridiculous issue out of all proportion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
